events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred at a busy intersection involving a rear-end collision causing visible damage to their vehicle.
Based on the information provided, the claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to manage this claim and will reach out to the insured to gather more details and assist with the process.
We have acknowledged the receipt of the claim and confirmed that the processing has officially started.
The insured was requested to submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any eyewitness statements available.
All requested documents including the police report and images of the damaged vehicle were received from the insured.
The investigation team has begun evaluating the details of the collision and reviewing the submitted evidence for liability assessment.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the insured was not at fault and damage estimates have been verified.
A settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and related costs was proposed to the insured for their approval.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of their claim and the proposed settlement offer.
Formal approval of the claim was granted following the insured’s acceptance of the settlement terms.
The payment for the approved settlement has been processed and disbursed to the insured’s account.
The claim case has been officially closed following successful resolution and payment to the insured.
All claim documents and communications have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
